title: Eddy Howard & His Orchestra - The 22 Golden Hits
description:
The good 'ol days when things were simple.  People were probably no more or less stressed out about social and world events then as we are today.  It's how we deal with things that matters.  Pop this in the player and transport decades in the past.  It is some amazing background music.

- Big Papi
